title: [BUG] DrawShapedText does not working on Ubuntu 20.04 x64
body:
DrawShapedText does not working on Ubuntu 20.04 x64, it works fine on windows.

**Code**

> using (var tf = SKFontManager.Default.MatchCharacter('1'))
		using (var shaper = new SKShaper(tf))
		using (var paint = new SKPaint { TextSize = 64, Typeface = tf })
		{
			canvas.Clear(SKColors.White);
			canvas.DrawShapedText(shaper, "123", 100, 200, paint);
		}

**Expected Behavior**

Display "123" on the window

**Actual Behavior**

Display "Q" and "R", and "Q" and "R" overlap.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue: 
SkiaSharp: 2.88.0-preview.179
SkiaSharp.Views.Gtk2: 2.88.0-preview.179
SkiaSharp.HarfBuzz: 2.88.0-preview.179
SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux: 2.88.0-preview.179
HarfBuzzSharp.NativeAssets.Linux: 2.8.2-preview.179

- Last known good version:  NO, early version crashed with exception: "double free or corruption (!prev)"
- IDE:  Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks:  Ubuntu 20.04 x64
